attributes.additional_details:
We the people have had enough with the constant Brexit delays, the dumb party politics, MPs acting like children in a playground by insulting each other as an excuse to block legislation, etc.
We want to replace MPs with ones that truly represent the wishes of people and not their own selfish interests.
attributes.background: Currently MPs are doing their best to block a Brexit deal and other legislation to benefit themselves for their own selfish political gain.  We the people want an immediate election to enable Parliament to function according to the will of the people.
